name: Momentum Capital LImited
overview:
Momentum Capital is a specialist private equity firm focused on adding momentum to companies who are not performing-to-plan but which have considerable unlocked value that can be exploited through the injection of new investment funds, experienced management and expertise, and the firm’s unique proprietary selection, planning and execution methodology.

Momentum Capital is an active investor. The firm takes a proactive approach and likes to exert a certain amount of control over what funds are applied to. The firm believes that this makes for a more powerful team with management and shareholders and accelerates growth.
